items.title: WATCH:  Man saved after clinging to pole for hours amid deadly flooding in India
items.description: A rescue team reportedly spent another two hours attempting to rescue him, securing him to their line and sending him across the water to dry ground.

items.title: Charlie Kirk's funeral designated SEAR 1 event by Dept. of Homeland Security
items.description: DHS has designated the upcoming funeral for conservative activist Charlie Kirk as a Special Event Assessment Rating (SEAR) Level 1 event.

items.title: WATCH:  Orcas attack and sink another boat off the coast of Portugal
items.description: A wild scene played out off the coast of Portugal, with a pod of orca whales seen attacking and sinking yet another boat.

items.title: House Speaker Johnson optimistic about vote to avert shutdown, but Democrats aren't
items.description: House Republicans plan to vote Friday morning on a short-term measure to fund the government as a shutdown deadline nears.

items.title: WATCH:  Holocaust survivor allegedly killed by 95-year-old roommate at NY nursing home
items.description: A 95-year-old woman is being held without bail at Rikers Island prison for allegedly beating to death her roommate, an 89-year-old Ukrainian Holocaust...
